attributes.action: Send repeat young offenders into the armed forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i belive that young repeat offenders are more likely to learn a lesson in the armed forces rather than to be put in prison where, many criminals 'boast' about how easy life is behind bars. our prisons are very nearly over spilling with repeat offenders and i think this is a way to solve two very big problems.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
